item.title: Open Letter to U.S. Ambassador to China Nicholas Burns Regarding Human Rights and Peaceful Protest
item.description: Date sent: December 11, 2023, 21:38 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.pdf On LinkedIn: On X (Twitter): Open letter to @USAmbChina Dear Ambassador Burns, I recently read your statement on International Human Rights Day 2023 with great interest and appreciation, particularly given my own experiences with human rights violations in China. Having endured what could only be… pic.twitter.com/VX9rppPIir — Vincent B. Le Corre (@VincentBLeCorre) December 11, 2023 Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.

item.title: Open Letter to French Foreign Office Minister Catherine Colonna, French Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary, Consul General Guillaume Roy, forwarded to Ambassador Burns and U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11_1353_0800_open_letter_to_colonna_lortholary_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Open Letter: Urgent Request for Resolution and Clarification on Critical Matters Date sent: December 11, 2023, 13:53 (China Standard Time) To: Catherine Colonna (French Minister for Europe and Foreign Affairs), Bertrand Lortholary (Ambassador of France to China), Roy Guillaume (France Consul General - China) Cc: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Edward Lehman I asked Assistant Legal Attaché to forward my communication to:
